content: Feb 18 Hershey Co said it would start using simpler ingredients in its chocolate bars and kisses brands  the latest chocolate maker yielding to U.S. consumers' concerns about the quality and sourcing of food.

title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: NEW YORK Hershey Co's 	 announcement on Thursday that it will buy jerky maker Krave Pure Foods Inc reflects a growing appetite for healthy snacks in the United States  even those that were once considered gas station staples. [ID:nL4N0V85VE]
name: Hershey Company (The)
title: Hershey's Krave buy reflects hunger for healthier snacks

content: Hershey Co  agreed to buy jerky maker Krave Pure Foods Inc for its first foray into meat snacks  a fast-growing market that is tempting health-conscious consumers away from chocolate.
name: Hershey Company (The)
title: Chocolate maker Hershey to enter meat snacks business

content: Jan 29 Hershey Co agreed to buy jerky maker Krave Pure Foods Inc for its first foray into meat snacks  a fast-growing market that is tempting health-conscious consumers away from chocolate.
name: Hershey Company (The)
title: UPDATE 2-Chocolate maker Hershey to enter meat snacks business

content: Jan 29 Chocolate maker Hershey Co  reported a lower-than-expected quarterly revenue as demand for bakery and meat snacks hurt chocolate sales.

title: Hershey's quarterly sales miss estimates

content: Jan 27 Chocolate maker Hershey Co is in late-stage talks to acquire Krave  a maker of healthy beef  turkey and pork jerky snacks  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: Hershey Company (The)
title: Hershey close to acquiring healthy snacks company Krave -sources

content: WASHINGTON U.S. Republicans  two weeks into controlling both houses of Congress  have invited comedian Jay Leno and former British Prime Minister Tony Blair to speak at their annual retreat in Hershey  Pennsylvania  party aides said on Tuesday.
name: Hershey Company (The)
title: Jay Leno  Tony Blair to speak at U.S. Republican retreat
